functions.name: get
functions.description: Returns details of the requested account, or null if it doesn't exist.

functions.name: getDefault
functions.description: Returns the default account, or null if it is not defined.

functions.name: setDefaultIdentity
functions.description: Sets the default identity for an account.

functions.name: getDefaultIdentity
functions.description: Returns the default identity for an account, or null if it is not defined.
